title: Hurry - Amazon's early Prime Day sale is ending soon - snag these epic deals now
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Early Prime Day deals on TVs, Echo, Blink Mini, and more
article: Prime Day is almost here, and to celebrate, Amazon has released fantastic deals on its best-selling devices exclusively for Prime members. You'll have to act fast though, these early Prime Day deals end tonight.

Some of the best pre-Prime Day deals include the Ring Doorbell Pro on sale for just $89.99, the Blink Mini on sale for a record-low price of $19.99, and the Amazon eero 6 Wi-Fi router marked down to an all-time low price of $83 (was $129). If you're interested in TV deals, Amazon has this Insignia 43-inch 4K Fire TV marked down to just $219.99 (was $319.99) and a massive $120 discount on the Toshiba 50-inch 4K Fire TV. Note, you must be an Amazon Prime member to snag this limited-time offer, but if you're not a member, you can sign up for a free 30-day trial and shop this deal plus other upcoming Prime Day offers. We've listed more of Amazon's early Prime Day deals below and keep in mind these bargains end tonight, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.
